name: Ovni Portal
description:
Author: Carlos Bretón
It's the first game I do. I created it for Tutorial Jam.
As a background, use the unity asset "Glowy Space - 2D Toon Parallax".
GamePlay: You have to dodge the asteroids that come to you. if you get caught goodbye
You can only move the ship with the portals. With the left button of the mouse you change the entrance portal (yellow) and with the right button the exit portal (red). The ship is transported from the yellow portal to red.
